Good Comments: RETARDED timing. You don't have to break to a new subtitle every time a character pauses to breathe!
They don'T QC, therefore tons of mistakes
subtitles were translated well and the type-setting was visually appealing
It's good. I really quite surprise!
Bad Comments: Chapters, song lyrics with kanji included (for us 日本語の学生), and decent translation, especially compared to the other options. Plus, they're sticking with it!
Easy to understand, and clear typesetting.
Seriously in need of some proofreading.
Admits they only use Youkai because they are too lazy to sub Ayakashi as Ayakashi. Also assumes everyone watching anime is male >:P
Nice type-settings (signs), good audio, video quality. Sub is good for my ears.
There were many grammar problems in the subtitles. Styling, though, was nicely done.

Good Comments: fast HD release subs, very good translated.
Bad Comments: Finally an english OP fansubber who gets the episode out the same day it's aired, and in HD.
